I fear we may be too late. After Lakan destroyed the bridge to the Sanctuary, he twisted Velik's defenses to foil teleport spells.

But there is another way: A pegasus can fly around the defenses, as well as the bulk of Lakan's forces.

We can summon the pegasi for you when you are ready. But we must remain here to summon them back so that Seir's forces can join you, when they arrive.

Quickly, now! Take the pegasi to Velik's Sanctuary - Garden!
